item.description:
Ok, I've been thinking about Sin City for a while. It's not far from many people. Bridgeport, Danbury, West Hartford and New Haven. I really think no matter where around these areas you are from, it should take you no less than 30 the most 35 minutes. 

 

Kiss 95.7 is there, so that basically means it's a mix of everything. Hip Hop, Top 40, House, etc... Enjoy the bar and even the 02 bar (oxygen bar) Let's have some fun come on down. I believe cover is about $10. Don't know if that's the same for ladies. If anyone knows please post.

 

Sin City in Waterbury... See You There

 

Christian

(860) 357-7264
item.name: Club Night @ Sin City
